name: io.bytes.per.checksum
description:
The number of bytes per checksum.  Must not be larger than
  io.file.buffer.size.

name: mapreduce.job.end-notification.retry.attempts
description:
The number of times the submitter of the job wants to retry job
    end notification if it fails. This is capped by
    mapreduce.job.end-notification.max.attempts

name: mapreduce.shuffle.connection-keep-alive.timeout
description:
The number of seconds a shuffle client attempts to retain
   http connection. Refer "Keep-Alive: timeout=" header in
   Http specification

name: mapreduce.job.encrypted-intermediate-data.buffer.kb
description:
Buffer size for intermediate encrypt data in kb
  default is 128

name: ipc.ping.interval
description:
Timeout on waiting response from server, in milliseconds.
  The client will send ping when the interval is passed without receiving bytes,
  if ipc.client.ping is set to true.

name: yarn.app.mapreduce.am.resource.cpu-vcores
description: The number of virtual CPU cores the MR AppMaster needs.

name: dfs.namenode.fs-limits.max-component-length
description:
Defines the maximum number of bytes in UTF-8 encoding in each
      component of a path.  A value of 0 will disable the check. Support
      multiple size unit suffix(case insensitive), as described in dfs.blocksize.
